title: 继Akamai.net之后，Akadns.net也被墙了
content:
联通的人不知道啥叫CDN和智能DNS？不可能吧…….

这次封锁还是在主干网上进行的，包括Engadget（瘾科技）和微软Technet等几千家网站同时受到影响。

C:\Users\Administrator>tracert technet.microsoft.com

Tracing route to technet.microsoft.akadns.net [64.4.11.252]
over a maximum of 30 hops:


6    67 ms    64 ms    63 ms  219.158.12.5

Pinging win.blogsmith.aol.com.aol.akadns.net [207.200.65.33] with 32 bytes of data:

Request timed out.

Request timed out.

Request timed out.

Request timed out.

哎….真是没啥好说的了。
